text: Randy Edward Smith (born March 3, 1960) is an American politician. He has been the president of the West Virginia Senate and the Lieutenant Governor of West Virginia since January 8, 2025. He is a Republican. He has been a member of the West Virginia Senate representing District 14 since January 11, 2017. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the West Virginia State Senate Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:State legislators of the United States Category:21st- century American politicians
title: Randy Smith (politician)
